⟨blu⟩  --> foo.proto:6:9
  ⟨blu⟩ |
⟨blu⟩ 6 | ⟨reset⟩        field
⟨blu⟩   | ⟨b.blu⟩--------⟨b.ylw⟩^^^^^ ⟨b.ylw⟩this is in front of some tabstops

⟨blu⟩   |  ⟨b.blu⟩specifically these

⟨reset⟩

  ⟨blu⟩ |
